name: aws-management-console-colorize
description: Chrome and Firefox extensions to change the header and footer colors of the AWS management console
author: Masaya Suzuki

scripts.build:firefox: bun run compile && wxt build -b firefox
scripts.build:firefox:dev: bun run compile && wxt build --mode development -b firefox
scripts.zip:firefox: bun run compile && wxt zip -b firefox
scripts.zip:firefox:dev: bun run compile && wxt zip --mode development -b firefox
